EmailTemplate.name: Licence about to Expire Example
EmailTemplate.subject: Licence about to expire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your {!arcusregserv__RS_Licence__c.RecordType} {!arcusregserv__RS_Licence__c.Name} will expire on {!arcusregserv__RS_Licence__c.arcusregserv__End_Date_Granted__c}.
Please apply for a renewal if you don't want the licence to lapse.
Best regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Title}
